title: Linux clock Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux clock command and learn how to display the current date and time, as well as set the system clock using practical examples.

meta.title: Linux clock Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux clock command and learn how to display the current date and time, as well as set the system clock using practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, clock command, date, time, system clock, configuration, settings

verify.name: Verify the current date and time
verify.hint: Make sure the current date is set to 2023-04-19 and the current time is set to 10:00:00.

verify.name: Verify the current date and time
verify.hint: Make sure the current date is set to 2023-04-19 and the current time is set to 10:00:00.

verify.name: Verify the system clock is set correctly
verify.hint: Make sure the current date is set to 2023-04-20 and the current time is set to 11:30:00.
